description:
Trakt to Discord Rich Presence

Discrakt bridges your Trakt.tv watching status to Discord Rich Presence. It runs silently in your system tray and automatically updates your Discord status when watching movies or TV shows tracked by Trakt.tv.
What's Changed
- docs: add Winget installation reference by @sitiom in #218
- chore(deps): upgrade discord-rich-presence to 1.1.0 by @afonsojramos in #222
- chore(deps): bump winresource from 0.1.29 to 0.1.30 by @dependabot[bot] in #220
- fix(trakt): use /users/me when OAuth token is present by @RoMinjun in #219
- fix: explicitly clear Discord activity before closing connection by @afonsojramos in #223
New Contributors
- @RoMinjun made their first contribution in #219
Full Changelog: v3.4.1...v3.4.2
